Package de.coreengine.rendering.model

Class Color

java.lang.Object
de.coreengine.rendering.model.Color
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Color
extends Object
implements Serializable
Represent a color in syncron rgb, hsb and srgb color models
Author:
Darius Dinger
See Also:
